Hi {!Contact.FirstName},
Ever wondered how a technology company approaches security? With over 40,000 enterprise customers, including 75% of the Fortune 100™, we are committed to protecting the privacy and business continuity of every client we serve. Click here to download the report: Learn How PGi Addresses Security, Resilience and Business Continuity. http://cdn2.hubspot.net/hub/147341/file-63353175-pdf/docs/PGiSecurityReport.pdf
Read this report and learn about PGi's business practices for:
• Dedicated security and business continuity protocols
• Secure physical environments and infrastructure
• Data security, resilience and redundancies with ongoing risk assessments
PGi enables companies to consolidate their entire organization's audio, web and video conferencing needs making it easier to meet anywhere, anytime and on virtually any device.
I'd like the opportunity to share with you how PGi's award-winning collaboration solutions can meet your needs. Please let me know your availability for a 15-minute virtual meeting by contacting me at the information below; otherwise I will follow up with you next week.
Sincerely,
{!User.FirstName} {!User.LastName} {!User.Title} {!User.Email} {!User.Phone}
P.S. If you are not the correct person to speak to about collaboration solutions within your organization, it would be great if you would direct me to the correct individual. Thanks in advance for your help!
